name: World Soccer Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3: Final Ver.
overview: The J-League Winning Eleven series is exclusive to Japan and has been released since 2007 before the release of Pro Evolution Soccer and World Soccer: Winning Eleven. Prior to 2007, the game was released after the earlier games were released. World Soccer Winning Eleven 3 - Final Version is the officially licensed action soccer game. It is the follow-up to J.league Jikkyou Winning Eleven 3 (ISS Pro 98 in US). A lot of bugs in the last version fixed here. For example : The match speed, shooting power, goalie movement, auto save ability, & camera option, etc. Game Modes: - Exhibition: Play against or with another human player or a computer opponent. - League: Choose a team a try to win a League. - International Cup : Compete in World Cup or Selfmade Tournament in different continents around the world. - All Star Match: Play as World all stars or Europe all stars. - P.K.: Penalty Kick Match - Training: Choose one of the teams and practice.
